key_risks: Supply chain disruptions leading to increased material costs and production delays
Regulatory risks due to changes in zoning laws, building codes, or other requirements
Economic sensitivity to interest rates and consumer spending
Labor shortages in the construction and manufacturing sectors
Workplace safety concerns and OSHA violations
controversies: Multiple OSHA citations for workplace safety violations
Potential legal liabilities due to safety concerns
environmental_issues: Introduction of eco-friendly building practices and materials
social_issues: Workplace safety concerns affecting employee well-being
governance_issues: History of OSHA violations raising questions about operational practices
Robust corporate governance guidelines and whistleblower policy in place
